title: Crash
body: I was playing a ranked game earlier when I alt tabbed. When I came back in the game, my game froze. I couldn't move and tried to alt tab. But, my game crashed and it took a while for my game to load back up. When I came back I lost the game and now I have a leaver buster.

replies.body: It helps if you post system specs, type of game, other software (especially overlays - steam, discord). Unlikely it is an issue with the game itself.
